topic.title: How to Change/Reset the Figure Numbering

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

body.p: There are cases when you need to change the aspect of the figure counter that is shown before the figure titles. By default, the figure titles are formatted like this:Figure NN. Lore Ipsum Title
NN is the number of the figure that starts being counted from the beginning of the publication.

One use-case is to have the NN counter be incremented only within one chapter (for example, first chapter contains "Figure 1" and "Figure 2", and second chapter starts over with "Figure 1" instead of incrementing to "Figure 3").

body.p: For the DITA Map PDF - based on HTML5 & CSS transformation scenario type, you should reset the figure counter on each topic marked as chapter, then hide the label from the figure figcaption (this is a HTML element generated by the XSL transformation), and create another label using a :before selector on the figcaption.
